string-array.item: Launching game. If this is the first time running Dungeon Crawl,
this might take a while. Please wait...
You can access help and options by pressing the menu button if you have it.
Otherwise, you can long-press on the screen to access the menu.
The screen is divided into a three by three grid for touch input. Tapping in
any of these grid areas sends the corresponding directional key to the program.
Feel free to send any suggestions to michaelbarlow7@gmail.com.
